cO-Op

a ridesharing cooperative

  • cO-Op flat rates never surge
  • cO-Op rates are midway between a Taxi and an UberX
  • cO-Op algorithim rewards drivers for good performance
  • cO-Op members recieve dividends
  • cO-Op dividend increases with passenger referrals

a cO-Op ride is always

a good ride!
